description.value:
Designate one humanoid within range of your spell that you can see. That target must make a Wisdom (Save) check and succeed, or be @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.OBTES08D2XC130IG]{Paralyzed} for the duration of this spell. The target gets a chance to make another Wisdom (Save) check at the end of each of their turns, and on a success, they break free and the spell ends.

Charge: This is a spell that can be Charged, increasing the damage done with this spell. Costs and increase are as follow:

  • 4 Mana: Cast on an additional target
  • 8 Mana: Cast on two additional targets


Note: Additional targets must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

materials.value: a small, straight piece of iron
